titleStmt.title: The Trinitarian scheme of religion, concerning almighty God and mankind considered both before and after the (pretended) fall : with notes thereoupon, which notes contain also the unitarian scheme.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.

notesStmt.note: This item also appears as part of A second collection of tracts ... London, 1693 (Wing S2267).
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
